name: Good Friend Song
intro:
生活难免会遇到一些烦人的事，但只要身边有几个懂你的朋友，生活就总会是好的。这是一首写给好朋友的歌，歌裡的世界是美善、是快乐的。听一听让你想起哪些朋友的话，就找他们一起听吧。 -- Natasha

Life can really stink sometimes, but when you have friends who really understand you around, it’d always be a good life. This is a song about good friends, hopefully it makes you feel wonderful and happy; if it reminds you of some friends, go ahead and invite them to listen to it with you! :) -- Natasha
